description: Sometimes, you want the benefits of Smartwool® Intraknit™ technology but without the sleeves. That where our Men’s Intraknit™ Active Tank comes in. With a slim fit that follows the contours of your body, this tank is designed to help reduce chafing, manage moisture and resist odor, and regulate your body temperature—right there at your core. From workouts in the gym to afternoon hikes to the falls, this tank will help you up your comfort level while you give your activity your all.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Active Tank - Mens
